summary: Build an app for an alumni association named "Gurukul Aulmni Assocation", including role-based administration, content/member management, and approved-member-only access.
architectural_notes: Add role-based access control (RBAC) beyond a single admin list; define roles/permissions for content (posts/announcements) and member management actions.
Introduce an approval state for members and enforce it during authentication/authorization so unapproved users cannot access the app.
Add support for user-uploaded profile pictures (storage, URLs, privacy: visible to all) with a placeholder fallback.
Add data model + admin CRUD for Executive Committee entries, including historical/past committees.
Add content models/pages for Gallery and Acts & Activities (likely admin-managed).
Provide admin-managed content models + CRUD UI for Gallery items and Acts & Activities entries (not just static pages).
known_issues: Admin Dashboard page is stuck on loading / not rendering, while other pages load correctly.
Admin page appears unchanged/old after deployment; expected new admin features/updates are not reflected (possible caching or deployment/versioning issue).
Gallery and Acts & Activities currently have no way for admins to add/manage content (missing admin content management UI/API).

existing_features.title: Create a responsive public landing page for "Gurukul Aulmni Assocation" that introduces the association and provides clear calls to action to sign in and explore the app.
Add Internet Identity sign-in and sign-out UI, and show the signed-in user’s principal (or a short form) in the app header/navigation.

Implement alumni profile management: allow a signed-in user to create/update their own alumni profile with fields: full name, graduation year, department/major, current city/country, bio, and optional contact (email or social link).
Implement a searchable alumni directory page that lists member profiles (name, graduation year, department/major, location) with filters for graduation year and department/major.
Add Events feature: a page to view upcoming/past events (title, date/time, location, description) and an admin-only interface to create/update/delete events.
Add Announcements feature: a page to view announcements (title, date, content) and an admin-only interface to create/delete announcements.
Create a coherent, distinctive visual theme for the app and apply it consistently across pages (typography, color palette, spacing, and components). Avoid a blue/purple primary theme.
Generate and include required static images for branding, store them in frontend/public/assets/generated, and reference them in the UI (e.g., header/landing).

Implement an approved-member workflow so that signing in with Internet Identity is not sufficient to use the app: a principal must be registered as a member and marked as Approved before they can access any authenticated features (directory, events, announcements, profile).

Create an Admin Dashboard page in the frontend with role-aware navigation and tools to manage announcements ("posts"), events, and members (approve/reject/suspend/remove) based on the signed-in user’s roles/permissions.
Update existing frontend auth gating to incorporate approval status (not just "isAuthenticated"): all non-public pages must require an Approved membership, while the landing page remains public.

Ensure the Admin Dashboard page is accessible from the app’s top navigation bar by adding a clearly labeled "Admin" navigation item that appears in the header navigation (desktop) and in the mobile menu when the signed-in user has admin permissions.

Create a new authenticated page route "/gallery" that shows an Alumni Gallery page (English UI text), gated behind the existing Approved-member workflow (i.e., the page must use the same RequireApproved wrapper pattern as Directory/Events/Announcements/My Profile).

Create a new authenticated page route "/activities" that shows an "Acts & Activities" page for the alumni (English UI text), gated behind the existing Approved-member workflow (i.e., the page must use the same RequireApproved wrapper pattern as Directory/Events/Announcements/My Profile).

Update the top navigation (desktop) and mobile menu to include links to the new pages: "Gallery" (to "/gallery") and "Acts & Activities" (to "/activities"), consistent with the existing navigation link behavior.

Prevent the app from getting stuck in a perpetual loading state by ensuring user/profile/admin/approval React Query hooks do not run (and do not contribute to loading spinners) when the user is not authenticated.

Update the auth/approval gating UI to handle backend/query failures gracefully: if approval/admin/profile checks fail or the backend cannot be reached, show an explicit error message with a retry action instead of showing an infinite loading indicator.

Ensure that the landing page ("/") renders reliably even if the backend is slow/unavailable by removing any dependency on backend queries for its initial render and by not showing a full-page loading state there.

Fix the app so that authenticated pages (Directory, Events, Announcements, My Profile, Gallery, and Acts & Activities) do not get stuck in an infinite loading state while the Admin Dashboard renders correctly.

Update the approval/auth gating and related access hooks so that actor/agent initialization delays or failures cannot cause an infinite loading UI; instead show an explicit error state with a Retry action that re-attempts the relevant queries.

Ensure page-level data queries for Directory/Events/Announcements/My Profile correctly handle the backend being unavailable by surfacing an error state (in English) rather than only a perpetual loading indicator.

Add a visible app build/version indicator in the UI so admins can confirm that the latest deployment is loaded (to reduce confusion when the Admin page appears unchanged). Show this indicator on the Admin Dashboard page and in the global footer.

Improve the Admin Dashboard member management experience to support the additional requested information: show separate views for Pending vs Approved members, and display member identity details (full name when available) alongside principal IDs.
Update frontend data hooks and the Members admin panel to use the new enriched backend API and display the additional member details in the Members table.

Add React Query hooks for listing and mutating Gallery and Acts & Activities content, following the existing patterns in frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts (actor availability checks, cache invalidation, and no unauthenticated querying).

Update the Gallery page (/gallery) and Acts & Activities page (/activities) to display backend-driven content (instead of placeholder arrays), while preserving the existing RequireApproved gating and showing a clear empty-state message when no items exist.

Add admin UI in the Admin Dashboard to manage Gallery and Acts & Activities content (create, edit, delete), using English user-facing text and respecting existing role/permission gating used by the Admin Dashboard.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create an alumni association app for "Gurukul Aulmni Assocation".

Implement backend authorization and administration: create a simple admin list managed in-canister, with a secure method for initial admin assignment and admin management actions restricted to admins only.
Create an admin dashboard/page with role-based access control (multiple roles) for managing posts/announcements and members (edit/remove/add, etc.).
Implement approved-member-only access: add member approval workflow so only approved members can log in/use the app.
Add backend data models and APIs for member administration: admins can list members, approve/reject/suspend members, and remove members from the system.
Implement role-based access control (multiple roles) beyond the current admin check, so different roles can manage different resources (e.g., announcements/posts, events, member approval/removal).

Ensure the backend upgrade is safe: if new persistent state is introduced for membership status and roles, add the required upgrade/migration handling so existing deployed data (profiles/events/announcements) is not lost when updating the canister.
Add an Admin page link/button in the app’s top navigation bar (showing it appropriately based on user role/permissions).
Show the signer’s name in the Admin Portal for membership approval requests (when users sign up and submit for approval).
In the Admin Portal, display the list of already-approved members/emails (in addition to pending approvals).
Add public profile pictures: allow members to upload a profile pic and display it anywhere profiles appear (e.g., directory), with a default placeholder when missing.
Add an Executive Committee page (including past committees) and provide an admin interface to add/edit/remove committee members.
Create a Gallery page for the alumni association app.
Create an Acts & Activities page for the alumni association app.

Add a backend admin-only API that returns approval entries enriched with the member’s saved profile information (when present) so the Admin UI can show the signer’s name and other basic details without requiring N+1 per-member calls.
Add admin interfaces to create/update/delete content for the Gallery and Acts & Activities pages (so admins can add items to these sections).

Add backend data models and APIs to support admin-managed content for the Gallery and Acts & Activities sections, including admin-only create/update/delete operations and approved-member read/list operations.

Ensure the new Gallery/Activities backend state is upgrade-safe and does not erase existing deployed state (profiles, events, announcements, approvals, and authorization data) when the canister is upgraded.
